replies.body: There should ALWAYS be a featured game mode, on a rotation or something. They have enough of them now and it would add so much more interest to the game as a whole. And there's no reason not to have them running.

What if there was a game mode called king of the hill or something, where there's a map of basically just one hill, and the teams are something like 3 v 5, and the 3 player team gets spawned at the top of the hill, and spawn just a few more minions, while the 5 player team gets spawned at the bottom, and spawns a few less minions. Here's where it gets interesting. Trying to climb the hill puts a slow on the enemy champions, while going down the hill actually increases speed. Of course there would have to be some tweaking made, especially with things such as Sion's ult, or Master Yi... Also, the actual winning of the game would be different, such as the capturing of the Nexus. If the 3 person team can hold on long enough, then they win, but if the 5 person team can take it before the set time, then they win.
